Fuck u man how to save the game without entering the key or without loging in to windows live??? sorry for the anger but after a 14gb download u are still asked for a key while saving is quite annoying. please help some one.

you should be able to make an offline account for windows live games, press the home button when the game is started, when pressed, a menu will show up, there you can make an offline account so you can save your game,, I hope this will help you :)
